casebody.data:
Sidney Lee CALDWELL, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
William Charles BROWN, Defendant-Appellee,
and
Frankenmuth Mutual Insurance Company, Defendant. SC: 158761
COA: 343674 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 30, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for miscellaneous relief is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the November 2, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court. The motion to take judicial notice is DENIED.
